title: Blitz Slow?!?
body: Every time i use W as blitzcrank it works for like 0.5 sec and then slow appears on top of his head and now hes slowed, this happened since the new patch Blitz's W is supposed to speed him up but its just slowing him down so stupid {{item:3070}} {{champion:53}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
That was an intentional change to Blitzcrank's kit. It was to encourage him to use it more wisely, as the threat of a "you die instantly" pull with the fact that he could speed around the map for around four second intervals was seemingly too overbearing.

Read the patch notes to stay informed!
